Package simplenlg.aggregation

Class Summary
AggregationHelper  
AggregationRule This class represents an aggregation rule.
Aggregator An Aggregator performs aggregation on clauses, by applying a set of prespecified rules on them and returning the result.
BackwardConjunctionReductionRule Implementation of the backward conjunction reduction rule.
ClauseCoordinationRule Implementation of a clausal coordination rule.
ForwardConjunctionReductionRule Implementation of the forward conjunction rule.
FunctionalSet  
NewAggregator  
PhraseChecker This class contains a number of utility methods for checking and collecting sentence components during the process of aggregation.
PhraseSet This class wraps an ordered list of phrases which are constituents of two or more (different) clauses and have the same discourse function in their parent clause.
 

Enum Summary
Periphery
